document.full_text: american international group inc  and the treasury are  considering whether to drop or scale back a large public offering of aig shares, because of the recent decline in the bailed-out insurer's share price, financial times reported on tuesday, citing people close to situation.
document.title: aig, treasury mull shelving share offer: report
lines_and_colors: american international group inc  and the treasury are  considering whether to drop or scale back a large public offering of aig shares, because of the recent decline in the bailed-out insurer's share price, financial times reported on tuesday, citing people close to situation.
